content.webTitle: What is the point of rewilding lynxes? (Is it to see if they purr?)

fields.headline: What is the point of rewilding lynxes? (Is it to see if they purr?)
fields.bodyText: What is the point of rewilding lynxes in the UK? Would this involve the killing of feral domestic cats? And while on the subject – do lynxes purr? Christina Healey, London SE1 Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them to nq@theguardian.com
